definitions.definition: To use a needle to pass thread repeatedly through (pieces of fabric) in order to join them together.
definitions.example: Balls were first made of grass or leaves held together by strings, and later of pieces of animal skin sewn together and stuffed with feathers or hay.

definitions.definition: To use a needle to pass thread repeatedly through pieces of fabric in order to join them together.
Followed by into: to enclose by sewing.
definitions.example: to sew money into a bag
